flavorText: An ancient nemesis rendered harmless long ago.

foreignData.flavorText: Eine uralte Bedrohung, die vor langer Zeit unschädlich gemacht wurde.
foreignData.name: Versiegelung
foreignData.text:
Aufblitzen
Wenn die Versiegelung ins Spiel kommt, schicke eine getappte Kreatur deiner Wahl, die ein Gegner kontrolliert, ins Exil, bis die Versiegelung das Spiel verlässt.

foreignData.flavorText: Una antigua némesis que fue subyugada hace mucho tiempo.
foreignData.name: Sellar
foreignData.text:
Destello.
Cuando Sellar entre al campo de batalla, exilia la criatura girada objetivo que controla un oponente hasta que Sellar deje el campo de batalla.

foreignData.flavorText: Un ancien ennemi rendu inoffensif il y a longtemps.
foreignData.name: Sceller
foreignData.text:
Flash
Quand Sceller arrive sur le champ de bataille, exilez une créature engagée ciblée qu'un adversaire contrôle jusqu'à ce que Sceller quitte le champ de bataille.

foreignData.flavorText: Un'antica nemesi resa inoffensiva molto tempo fa.
foreignData.name: Sigillare
foreignData.text:
Lampo
Quando Sigillare entra nel campo di battaglia, esilia una creatura TAPpata bersaglio controllata da un avversario finché Sigillare non lascia il campo di battaglia.

foreignData.flavorText: 古代の巨悪も無害な存在となって久しい。
foreignData.name: 封じ込め
foreignData.text:
瞬速
封じ込めが戦場に出たとき、対戦相手がコントロールしていてタップ状態のクリーチャー１体を対象とし、封じ込めが戦場を離れるまでそれを追放する。

foreignData.flavorText: 오래 전에 그 힘을 잃은 고대의 천벌.
foreignData.name: 떼어내기
foreignData.text:
섬광
떼어내기가 전장에 들어올 때, 상대가 조종하는 탭된 생물을 목표로 정한다. 떼어내기가 전장을 떠날 때까지 그 생물을 추방한다.

foreignData.flavorText: Uma nêmese ancestral, há muito tornada inofensiva.
foreignData.name: Selar
foreignData.text:
Lampejo
Quando Selar entrar no campo de batalha, exile a criatura virada alvo que um oponente controla até que Selar deixe o campo de batalha.

foreignData.name: Запечатать
foreignData.text:
Миг
Когда Запечатать выходит на поле битвы, изгоните целевое повернутое существо под контролем оппонента до тех пор, пока Запечатать не покинет поле битвы.

foreignData.flavorText: 曾为古时宿敌，但早已不再是威胁。
foreignData.name: 摘离
foreignData.text:
闪现
当摘离进战场时，放逐目标由对手操控且已横置的生物，直到摘离离开战场为止。

foreignData.flavorText: 曾為古時宿敵，但早已不再是威脅。
foreignData.name: 摘離
foreignData.text:
閃現
當摘離進戰場時，放逐目標由對手操控且已橫置的生物，直到摘離離開戰場為止。

name: Seal Away
originalText:
Flash
When Seal Away enters the battlefield, exile target tapped creature an opponent controls until Seal Away leaves the battlefield.

rulings.text: If Seal Away leaves the battlefield before its triggered ability resolves, the target creature won’t be exiled.

Auras attached to the exiled creature will be put into their owners’ graveyards. Any Equipment will become unattached and remain on the battlefield. Any counters on the exiled creature will cease to exist. When the card returns to the battlefield, it will be a new object with no connection to the card that was exiled.
If a token is exiled this way, it will cease to exist and won’t return to the battlefield.

text:
Flash
When Seal Away enters the battlefield, exile target tapped creature an opponent controls until Seal Away leaves the battlefield.
